ComicInfo.Title: A Hunter, An Archer, & A Sucker
ComicInfo.Summary:
Knocking 'em down is one thing. Keeping 'em down is another thing entirely! When a dangerous adversary thought to be dead returns and seeks revenge on Robyn, only Liesel Van Helsing can help prevent disaster. But this foe's cunning runs deep. He underestimated Robyn once before and it almost cost him his life. He'll be damned if he makes the same mistake twice.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Drew Johnson & Ceci de la Cruz | 1 | B | Cover B | Jose Luis & Sanju Nivangune | 2 | C | Cover C | Cris de Lara | 3 | D | Cover D | Allan Otero & Victor Bartlett | 4 |

ComicInfo.Characters: Gabby Martin, Hellchild, Julia Gengrich, Liesel Van Helsing, Robyn Hood
